name: Hysteria (dmangames, Flat White Canvas, Chungard)
description:
For the bext experience, please download the game on windows.

But she isn't a witch!

"I am not a witch as they say. Please help me!" Defend Bridget Bishop, a shopkeeper in Salem, who has been accused of witchcraft. 

Your trusty pidgeon will deliver orders to the court to test Bridget with different witch trials: Water ducking, blood pricking, prayer recital, curing a bewitched victim with touch, searching her body for witches marks, and feeding a cake made of her urine to a dog. 

Hysteria knows not logic. How to play this game (extravagantly-titled demo) Try to figure out which trials Bridget might pass based on her health and history. 

Use the coloured cards at the bottom of the screen, which represent these trials, and attach one to your pidgeon. the pidgeon will return with the results and the public Hysteria (on the right) will increase or decrease. 

Once you have done all you can do to decrease Hysteria, send the court Order via pidgeon to start the trial.
